item.title: cosi binary
item.description:
We just finished our latest cothority-binary for you to try out. You can fetch the binary at

https://github.com/dedis/cothority/releases/latest

or follow the compilation instructions at

https://github.com/DeDiS/cothority

Be sure to report any successful installation of your servers to

https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/cothority

Also donâ€™t hesitate to ask questions on that forum or open issues on github.

item.title: Overview of the project
item.description:
The DeDiS-lab at EPFL started in August 2015 with the arrival of Bryan Ford at EPFL. With a team of software-engineers, PhD-students and postdocs, we’ve been working on different projects, like:

  • Cothority - getting collective signatures from thousands of signers
  • PriFi - Privacy enhanced WLANs using MixNets
